cves.description: Memory corruption whhile handling the subsystem failure memory during the parsing of video packets received from the video firmware.
Memory corruption while processing packet data with exceedingly large packet.
problemType: CWE-120 Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')

cves.description: Memory corruption during sub-system restart while processing clean-up to free up resources.
Memory corruption during the image encoding process.

versions.version: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing data packets in diag received from Unix clients.
problemType: CWE-120 Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing command message in WLAN Host.
Memory corruption while processing event close when client process terminates abruptly.

versions.version: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

cves.description: Memory corruption while processing the TESTPATTERNCONFIG escape path.
Memory corruption while processing multiple simultaneous escape calls.

versions.version: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

cves.description:
A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2025 (All versions < V225.0 Update 5). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated structure while parsing specially crafted PAR files.
This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.
Transient DOS while handling beacon frames with invalid IE header length.
